jobDetails.jobDescription:
Overview:We provide automation and digitalization technologies to the world's leadingprocess industries, serving over 30,000 large industrial enterprises globally with ateam of 5,000+ employees. Our R&D teams focus on Process Industry AI (AIO) and modern industrial software applications, with work locations in Singapore, China Hangzhou, and Japan.
Job Responsibilities:Build stunning industrial apps with modern software tech, making legacy industrial software obsolete.
Preferred Qualities: Passion towards software engineering—constantly following the latest trends on Hacker News, and your GitHub heatmap is deep green. No prior knowledge of industrial automation is required.
Qualifications:A portfolio you’re proud of—GitHub, Figma, or a personal site. Deep expertise in cutting-edge software—event-driven architecture, Apache Iceberg, Next.js, or similar. Full-stack skills—You can set up VMs, deploy containers with Helm, manage Kubernetes, store to S3, and CRUD + render it all in a browser.
